The 2025 League of Legends World Championship marks a historic milestone: the 15-year anniversary of LoL Esports. Worlds is the pinnacle of competition, where the best teams from leagues around the globe face off for the ultimate title. search_results.title: All qualified teams for League of Legends World ...
search_results.text:
[Home](https://esportsinsider.com)
>
[League of Legends](https://esportsinsider.com/esports-titles/moba/lol)

Gen.G during MSI 2025. Image credit: Liu YiCun, Riot Games

**League of Legends Worlds 2025** is fast approaching, and in just a few weeks, 17 teams will start the climb to the highest peak the game’s esports scene can offer.

Taking place in China, some teams will kick off the event on October 14th with Play-In matches, while others will wait in the Swiss Stage. As always, only eight teams will qualify for the Knockout Stage, with one team walking out as world champion on November 9th.

There’s still a long road before League of Legends’ biggest event of the season begins, as most regions still have to hold their Summer Finals. Still, a few teams already made it through due to the Split’s formats — or because the organisation won MSI months back.

search_results.title: Worlds 2025: Simple Format Guide
search_results.text: The League of Legends World Championship (Worlds 2025) will take place in China, the start is set for October 14th. The cities which will host the League of Legends World Championship are: Play-ins and Swiss stage – Beijing Smart Esports Center, Beijing Quarterfinals & Semifinals – Mercedes-Benz Arena, Shanghai Finals – Dong’an Lake Sports Park Multifunctional Gymnasium, Chengdu Worlds 2025 Teams There will be 17 participating teams, divided respectively according to the region they belong to: LPL Top 4 Teams ( China 🇨🇳 ) : BLG (BiliBili Gaming ) #1 Seed AL ( Anyone’s Legend ) #2 Seed TES ( Top Esports ) #3 Seed IG (Invicutus Gaming) #4 Seed LCK Top 4 Teams ( Korea 🇰🇷 ) : HLE ( Hanwha Life Esports ) #1 Seed KT (KT Rolster) #2 Seed GEN (Gen.G) #3 Seed T1 (T1) #4 Seed The 4th Seeds of Those 2 Regions will fight for a Swiss Stage Spot on the 14th of October at 10:00 AM CET LTA Top 3 Teams ( Americas 🌎) : FLY ( Flyquest ) #1 Seed VKS (Vivo Keyd Starts) #2 Seed 100T (100 Thieves ) #3 Se

search_results.title: 2025 LoL World Championship Details Revealed
search_results.text:
[League of Legends](https://www.invenglobal.com/game/league-of-legends)

# 2025 LoL World Championship Details Revealed

[John Popko](https://www.invenglobal.com/author/john-popko/articles)

**Oct 1, 2025**

- [Twitter](javascript:sendSns('twitter');)
- [Facebook](javascript:sendSns('facebook');)
- [Reddit](javascript:sendSns('reddit');)
- [Pinterest](javascript:sendSns('pinterest');)
- [URL](javascript:;)

Riot Games has unveiled full details for the 2025 League of Legends World Championship, commemorating the 15th anniversary of the esport’s premier event. The month-long tournament will begin October 14 in Beijing and conclude November 9 in Chengdu, featuring teams from all five major regions.

The event will open with a best-of-five Play-In series between Korea’s T1 and China’s Invictus Gaming. The winner will move on to the Swiss Stage, while the loser will be eliminated. Riot emphasized the tournament’s theme, “Earn Your Legacy,” underscoring the idea that championship glory must

metadata.title: Which team will win the 2025 League of Legends World Championship?
metadata.description:
[League of Legends](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/League_of_Legends) is [multiplayer online battle arena](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiplayer_online_battle_arena) (MOBA) game in which players control a single character, or "champion," from an isometric perspective. The primary mode features two teams of five with the ultimate goal of destroying the enemy team's main structure, the Nexus.

The [League of Legends World Championship](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/League_of_Legends_World_Championship) is an annual professional esports tournament held to determine which team will be crowned champion of League of Legends. The tournament is the culmination of a yearly season in which teams compete in various events throughout the year, including regional qualifiers and the [Mid-Season Invitational](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2025_Mid-Season_Invitational) hoping to qualify for the World Championship.

Every year, roughly 20 teams qualify, with the [2025 edition](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2025_League_of_Legends_World_Championship) featuring 17 teams. Since the tournament begun, nearly all winners have been from the South Korea or China regions, with most runner-ups being from there too.  The 2025 World Championship begins October 14th and ends November 9th.

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":39753,"question_id":39146}}`
metadata.resolution_criteria:
This team will resolve as the winning team of the [2025 League of Legends World Championship](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2025_League_of_Legends_World_Championship).

If the winning team is from the Asia-Pacific, EMEA, or Americas region, this question will resolve as the respective region.
